this_title: Deceptive Practice: The Mysteries and Mentors of Ricky Jay
trans_title: 欺诈练习：魔术师瑞奇·杰的神秘故事
introduction: Ricky Jay is a world-renowned magician, author, historian and actor (often a mischievous presence in the films of David Mamet and Paul Thomas Anderson) -- and a performer who regularly provokes astonishment from even the most jaded audiences. Deceptive Practice traces Jay's achievements and influences, from his apprenticeship at age 4 with his grandfather, to such now-forgotten...
chinese_title: 欺诈练习：魔术师瑞奇·杰的神秘故事
foreign_title: Deceptive Practice: The Mysteries and Mentors of Ricky Jay
